verses.roman:
eka-dina prabhu haridāsere mililā
tāṅhā lañā goṣṭhī kari' tāṅhāre puchilā

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haridāsere—with Haridāsa Ṭhākura; mililā—met; tāṅhā lañā—taking him; goṣṭhī kari'-making a discussion; tāṅhāre puchilā—the Lord inquired from him.
translation: One day Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu met Haridāsa Ṭhākura as usual, and in the course of discussion He inquired as follows.
